body:
Hey, I've started to get a fetish of creating somewhat nicely made diamond swords. I'll start making more of these as time goes on

Thanksgiving Diamond Sword (Pretty ugly, can make better) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nF_u2EXF-W8 (Download in description)

If you want me to make any diamond swords or series of swords, message me ingame or on skype.

title: Diamond Sword Speed Edits
